# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE - edit the master and reinstall.
# (/tmp/crontab.XXXXt1hh7G installed on Sun Dec  5 22:03:38 2010)
# (Cron version V5.0 -- $Id: crontab.c,v 1.12 2004/01/23 18:56:42 vixie Exp $)
MAILTO='webbs@demog.berkeley.edu'
HOME='/home/webbs'
PATH='/bin:/usr/bin'

#Mins  Hours  Days   Months  Day of the week


# try doing basic lcfit connection
1 * * * *  /bin/sh /home/webbs/lcfit.git/TESTING/curl_lcfit.sh

# backup schema
1 0 * * * /usr/bin/pg_dump --schema-only --no-privileges --no-owner  larrydb > $HOME/lcfit.git/DATABASE/schema.sql 

# daily email, maintenance
2 3 * * * /usr/bin/python $HOME/lcfit.git/MAINTENANCE/daily.py 

# testing
28 1 * * sun,wed,thu,fri (export PYTHONPATH="$PYTHONPATH:$HOME/lcfit.git/INTERNET_APPLICATION";  for i in `seq 1 6`; do /usr/bin/python  $HOME/lcfit.git/TESTING/LcBigTest.py ; sleep $i ; done)

# clean out testing objects
1 4 * * mon,thu (find $HOME/ -iname 'objectdump*' | xargs rm -v) 

# backup this crontab
10 0 * * *  /usr/bin/crontab -l > $HOME/lcfit.git/MAINTENANCE/mycrontab.txt

# pg_dumpall once a week
10 3 * * thu  /usr/bin/pg_dumpall > /other/webbs/dbdump.sql && /bin/gzip /other/webbs/dbdump.sql
